General.Name: Mainova AG
General.Description: Mainova AG operates as an energy service provider in Germany. It operates through Electricity Supply; Gas Supply; Generation and District Heating; Renewable Energy/Energy Services; Water Supply; Investments; and Other Activities segments. The company generates and supplies electricity and heat using thermal, wind, solar, and biomass power plants. It is also involved in the supply of gas and water, as well as street lighting business. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany. Mainova AG is a subsidiary of Stadtwerke Frankfurt Am Main Holding Gmbh.
